name: Stuck in the "Loop"
description:
You're a soul... or at least what is left of it. You're stuck in a loop between demons. Try to get out by reaching one of them.

Controls:

A, D or arrow keys to move left and right

Spacebar to jump (you can jump mid-air if you found powerups)

Credits:

Programmers:

Michał Winkler

Piotr Wandycz

Graphics:

Michał Winkler

Music:
Hard Rock Hallelujah - Lordi
Album: The Arockalypse
Made: 19th may 2006
Genre: hard rock, heavy metal
Length: 03:04 (eurovision version)
Publisher: Drakkar Records
Producer: Jyrki Tuovinen
Format: single
